com.paydiant.android.ui.service.security

Interface IUserLoginExtendedListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IUserLoginListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserLoginListenerAdapter

    public interface IUserLoginExtendedListener
extends IUserLoginListener
    Provides extended functionality for the user login functionality.
    Since:
    4.0.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.paydiant.android.ui.service.security.IUserLoginListener

        CHECK_LONG_LIVE_SESSION_EVENT, EXPIRE_DEVICE_AUTH_TOKEN_EVENT, GENERATE_DEVICE_AUTH_TOKEN_EVENT, LOGIN_BY_DEVICE_AUTH_TOKEN_EVENT, LOGIN_BY_FEDERATED_IDENTITY_EVENT, LOGIN_BY_NONCE_EVENT, LOGIN_BY_PIN_EVENT, LOGIN_BY_USERNAME_PASSWORD_EVENT

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPromptMFA(DeviceSecurityProfile deviceSecurityProfile)
      MFA callback handler for IUserLoginService.loginByNonce(DeviceSecurityProfile) and IUserLoginService.loginByFederatedIdentity(DeviceSecurityProfile) calls.
      void onSuccess(Map<String,String> additionalAttributes)
      This callback method gets invoked after a successful login.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.paydiant.android.ui.service.security.IUserLoginListener

        onError, onExpireDeviceAuthToken, onFailed, onGenerateDeviceAuthToken, onIsLongLivedSessionsEnabled, onLoginByDeviceAuthToken, onPromptMFA, onSuccess

    • Method Detail

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess(Map<String,String> additionalAttributes)
        This callback method gets invoked after a successful login. Any additional information returned thorough the login process will be available through the additionalAttributes parameter.

        Note: Use only this method or the IUserLoginListener.onSuccess() method to handle successful login callbacks.
        Parameters:
        additionalAttributes - Any additional information related to the device or login as key value pairs.
        See Also:
        ISecurityManagerFacade.getAdditionalAttributes()

      • onPromptMFA

        void onPromptMFA(DeviceSecurityProfile deviceSecurityProfile)
        MFA callback handler for IUserLoginService.loginByNonce(DeviceSecurityProfile) and IUserLoginService.loginByFederatedIdentity(DeviceSecurityProfile) calls.
        Parameters:
        deviceSecurityProfile - the device security profile with the MFA questions populated.
        Since:
        5.3.0.2
